name: Shadow Warrior 2: Special Reserve Collector's Edition
summary: Shadow Warrior 2 Special Reserve Collector's Edition includes Shadow Warrior 2, Shadow Warrior, Shadow Warrior Classic Redux, and all associated DLC and soundtracks including a printed artbook, stickers, and numbered box.
